question_list.question: How critical are the enhancements?
question_list.description:
Speedy Stream wants to improve the current prototype. To decide what to prioritize, we want your feedback on the current prototype you saw on the previous page (before any improvement). Please use Quadratic voting with 100 voice credits to answer the following question:

How critical are the improvements on each video element in the current prototype for you to understand the content in a weather forecast video?

If you need a refresher on how QV works, please click on "Remind me how QV works" below to expand the instruction.

options.description: The sound of the audio is clear and not muffled
The visuals of the video are clear and not pixelated
The audio is smooth and does not stutter
The video visuals play smoothly and do not jitter
The audio and visuals are in sync
